name: yahoo_finance_scrape_news
description: Scrape latest financial news from Yahoo Finance for a given stock or general market news. Returns headlines, summaries, sources, timestamps, and article URLs.

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: Stock ticker symbol for news (e.g. 'AAPL', 'TSLA') or leave empty for general market news

steps.label: Wait for news articles to load

steps.code: const articles = []; const articleEls = document.querySelectorAll('[data-testid="news-stream"] li, [class*="stream"] li, [class*="news-item"], article, [class*="js-stream-content"] li'); for (let i = 0; i < Math.min(articleEls.length, 15); i++) { const el = articleEls[i]; const titleEl = el.querySelector('h3, h2, [class*="title"] a, a[class*="title"]'); const linkEl = el.querySelector('a[href*="/news/"], a[href*="finance.yahoo.com"], a'); const summaryEl = el.querySelector('p, [class*="summary"], [class*="description"]'); const sourceEl = el.querySelector('[class*="source"], [class*="provider"], span[class*="publishing"]'); const timeEl = el.querySelector('time, [class*="time"], [class*="date"], [class*="ago"]'); const imgEl = el.querySelector('img'); if (titleEl) { articles.push({ title: titleEl.textContent.trim(), url: linkEl ? linkEl.href : '', summary: summaryEl ? summaryEl.textContent.trim().substring(0, 500) : '', source: sourceEl ? sourceEl.textContent.trim() : '', time: timeEl ? timeEl.textContent.trim() : '', image: imgEl ? imgEl.getAttribute('src') : '' }); } } return { symbol: '{{symbol}}', article_count: articles.length, articles: articles, url: window.location.href }
steps.name: news_data
steps.label: Extract news articles
